canSyncTasks.description: Indicates whether tasks can be synchronized with this project

users.description: List of users associated with the project

platform.description: Platform on which the project is created

createdAt.description: Date and time when the project was created

workspaceId.description: Identifier of the workspace to which the project belongs

workspaceName.description: Name of the workspace to which the project belongs

foreign.description: Indicates if the project is a foreign project

favorite.description: Flag indicating if the project is marked as favorite

hasWebhook.description: Flag indicating if the project has a webhook configured

estimatesType.description: Type of estimates used for project's time tracking

isTemplate.description: Indicates if the project is a template project

unarchiveDisabledBy.description: Reason why the project unarchiving is disabled
